entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow Shower and Blowing Snow, -15.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sault Ste. Marie Airport 1:54 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow Shower and Blowing Snow
Temperature: -15.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.2 kPa rising
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 70 %
Wind Chill: -28
Dewpoint: -20.1°C
Wind: NNW 32 km/h gust 48 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Friday: A few flurries. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 30 this morning and minus 20 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20 with temperature rising to minus 12 by morning. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Periods of light snow beginning after midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 20 with temperature rising to minus 12 by morning. Wind chill minus 27 this evening. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the afternoon then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 20 then light near noon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023
